beers.name: Pliny the Elder
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-4499_ddce0_sm.jpeg
beers.description: Brewed with Amarillo, Centennial, CTZ, Cascade, Warrior, and Simcoe hops. Slightly bitter with aromas of citrus, pine, and floral.

beers.name: Pliny the Younger
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-5187259_72193_sm.jpeg
beers.description: Pliny the Younger was Pliny the Elder's nephew, in the case of this beer, the Younger is a triple IPA. Medium bodied with tons of hop character in the aroma and mouthfeel. Well balanced and smooth.

beers.name: Helles
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-1685614_f399a_sm.jpeg
beers.description: Light lager and the purest expression of malt. Known to Bavarians simply as 'lager bier,' it is meant to toe the line between bland and sublime.

beers.name: Island Rascal
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/assets/images/temp/badge-beer-default.png
beers.description: Passion fruit white ale.

beers.name: Two Hearted IPA
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-4133_7382c_sm.jpeg
beers.description: Brewed with 100% Centennial hops and bursting with hop aromas ranging from pine to grapefruit from massive hop additions in both the kettle and the fermenter.

beers.name: Fat Tire Ale
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-6887_8b748_sm.jpeg
beers.description: Made with premium ingredients, Fat Tire is a bright and balanced beer that's certified carbon neutral.

beers.name: La Terroir
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-30888_6062a_sm.jpeg
beers.description: Le Terroir is a french term meaning “of the earth”. Add in another variable by dry-hopping with a rotating blend of fruit forward hops and we created a beer that changes every time we brew it.

beers.name: 90 Shilling
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-odell90-Shilling.jpg
beers.description: An irresistibly smooth and delicious medium-bodied amber ale.

beers.name: Easy Street
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-odellEasyStreet.jpg
beers.description: Light and refreshing, Easy Street Wheat is an unfiltered American-style wheat beer. Leaving in the yeast gives the beer a nice, smooth finish and a slightly citrusy flavor.

beers.name: Palisade Peach Wheat
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-3936376_3a20a_sm.jpeg
beers.description: Hazy American wheat bursting with peach flavor.

beers.name: Grapefruit Sculpin
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-285658_c3745_sm.jpeg
beers.description: Our Grapefruit Sculpin is the latest take on our signature IPA. The tart freshness of grapefruit perfectly complements our IPA's citrusy hop character.

beers.name: Brainless Raspberries
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-322030_047d4_sm.jpeg
beers.description: Hints of raspberry bubble gum flavors from the Belgian yeast and fresh raspberries tease the pallet in this Brainless® offering.

beers.name: Punkin Ale
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-4946504_b39d1_sm.jpeg
beers.description: A full-bodied brown ale with smooth hints of pumpkin and brown sugar.

beers.name: Hey Pard' Pils
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/assets/images/temp/badge-beer-default.png
beers.description: Pilsner style lager that is crisp, clean, slightly sweet.

beers.name: Apricot Wheat
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-4868_df8af_sm.jpeg
beers.description: Our easy drinking wheat beer is light in color and body ... perfect for those looking for a lighter taste.

beers.name: Dragons & YumYums
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-2522775_4fbe0_sm.jpeg
beers.description: A music collaboration of epic proportions with The Flaming Lips, this lip smackingly tart pale ale is brewed with dragonfruit, yumberry, passion fruit, pear juice and black carrot juice for an explosion of fruit in every sip!

beers.name: Raspberry Blonde
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-1880272_31389_sm.jpeg
beers.description: Raspberry Blonde empowers the senses with fresh raspberries and a lightly tart finish.

beers.name: A Beer of Very Little Brain
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-1184451_4ca33_sm.jpeg
beers.description: A warm lager fermentation creates a unique flavor profile that       perfectly compliments this style of beer.

beers.name: Grammatical Fiction
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/assets/images/temp/badge-beer-default.png
beers.description: IPA brewed and dry hopped with Citra, Comet & Simcoe hops.

beers.name: Tank 7
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-10891_0c3e3_sm.jpeg
beers.description: A traditional Belgian-style farmhouse ale, the perfect combination of elements came together in their #7 fermenter.

beers.name: Unfiltered Wheat Beer
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-10501_0b26b_sm.jpeg
beers.description: A lively, refreshing ale with a natural citrusy flavor and distinctive cloudy appearance.

beers.name: Dark Truth Stout
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-10589_a2513_sm.jpeg
beers.description: Layers of complex flavors slowly emerge from the glass: espresso, roasted fig, crème brulée.

beers.name: Nutcracker Ale
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-10376_655f1_sm.jpeg
beers.description: This hearty, warming brew is a classic winter ale, deep amber in color, with hints of molasses balanced by the “spiciness” of Chinook hops.

beers.name: Jam Band
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-2483160_1d7a5_sm.jpeg
beers.description: Jam Band burst onto the scene this year as an improvised fusion of dark berry flavors and zippy citrus chords.

beers.name: Pumking
beers.label: https://assets.untappd.com/site/beer_logos/beer-4886_753be_sm.jpeg
beers.description: Pumpkin puree and pie spices, malty, bready; cinnamon dominates with nutmeg and vanilla in the background.
